com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets

Annotation Type PathField


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface PathField
    Represents a Widget of type CQ.form.PathField in Classic UI Represents a Widget of type granite/ui/components/foundation/form/pathbrowser in Touch UI

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean escapeAmp
      Used for Classic UI only True to url-encode the ampersand character (&) to %26.
      boolean hideTrigger
      Used for Classic UI only True to disable the option to open the browse dialog
      String optionLoader
      Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for an option loader callback function.
      String optionTitleReader
      Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for callback function that gets an option value object as parameter and should return a stringified title for this option.
      String optionValueReader
      Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for callback function that gets an option value object as parameter and should return a stringified value for this option.
      boolean parBrowse
      Used for Classic UI only True to allow paragraph browsing and section in a grid next to the tree panel in the browse dialog.
      String rootPath
      The root path where completion and browsing starts.
      String rootTitle
      Used for Classic UI only Custom title for the root path
      boolean showTitleInTree
      Used for Classic UI only Whether to show the (jcr:)titles as names of the tree nodes or the plain jcr node name

    • Element Detail

      • escapeAmp

        public abstract boolean escapeAmp
        Used for Classic UI only True to url-encode the ampersand character (&) to %26.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • hideTrigger

        public abstract boolean hideTrigger
        Used for Classic UI only True to disable the option to open the browse dialog
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • parBrowse

        public abstract boolean parBrowse
        Used for Classic UI only True to allow paragraph browsing and section in a grid next to the tree panel in the browse dialog. If this is enabled, it is recommended to use a predicate like 'hierarchy' to have pages as leaf nodes in the tree.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • rootPath

        public abstract String rootPath
        The root path where completion and browsing starts. Use the empty string for the repository root
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "/"

      • rootTitle

        public abstract String rootTitle
        Used for Classic UI only Custom title for the root path
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "Websites"

      • showTitleInTree

        public abstract boolean showTitleInTree
        Used for Classic UI only Whether to show the (jcr:)titles as names of the tree nodes or the plain jcr node name
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true

      • optionLoader

        public abstract String optionLoader
        Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for an option loader callback function. Takes two arguments: (path, callback). See the default option loader implementation for more details on how to use this. If not given, a default option loader will be used that just returns paths from the current repository. The default option loader can be found in /libs/granite/ui/components/foundation/form/pathbrowser/render.jsp
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • optionValueReader

        public abstract String optionValueReader
        Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for callback function that gets an option value object as parameter and should return a stringified value for this option.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""

      • optionTitleReader

        public abstract String optionTitleReader
        Used for Touch UI only Javascript source code for callback function that gets an option value object as parameter and should return a stringified title for this option.
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        ""
